Translations.Text: Ih, Yunes ar seg imazanen
Mi irwel ar sfina iccuoen
Ijbed taseqqaot, iubee ed seg wid ipwaveggoen
Isseblaa it uslem, u neppa degs tiyta
Lemmer ur illi, neppa, seg wid isbuccuaen
ad iqqim deg uaabbuv is, ar ass n tu$alin nnsen
Nveggeo it id, s aqeoqao, d amuvin
Nessenker ed $uoes, ttejoa n texsayt
Nuzen it ar twinas igima, uger
Umnen. Neooa ten zzhan kan tallit
Steqsi ten maday, i Mass ik, tullas; i nitni, arrac
Ne$ Nexleq lmalayek d nnta, nitni d inagan
Day, s tkerkas nnsen, ihi, a d inin
Iurew ed Oebbi"? Nitni, s tidep, d ikeddaben
Ismenyaf tullas i warrac
Acu ikwen iu$en? Amek tepeuddum
Day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ne$ tesaam adabu n uuee
Aset ed s tezmamt nnwen, ma tessawalem tidep
Gren d nnesba garaS d leonun. Irna leonun eoan ara d rsen
Gedha s Oebbi, mgal ayen qqaoen
Kkes ed imdanen n Oebbi izedganen
Ihi, kunwi, akked wayen taabdem
ur d tesskarem ahewwel, mgal iS
siwa win ara io$en di tmes
Ur illi yiwen, degne$, ur nesai amekkan ipwassnen
Ih, nekwni d leufuf
Ih, nekwni d wid i isbuccuaen
Llan la qqaoen
lemmer day $uone$ asmekti seg imezwura
a nili, war ccekk, d imdanen iaaoviyen n Oebbi
Nekoen T. Deqqal ad eoen
Ih, izwar ed wawal nne£, i imdanen nne£ imazanen
Ih, d nitni ara ipwasellken
S tidep, d iasekoiwen nne£, ara irebeen
Ihi, iiixeo asen kra n tallit
Ssiked iten, deqqal ad walin
Day earen af uaaqeb nne£
Ma irs ed ar umekkan nnsen, ay dir ip tuebeit n wid ippunedoen
Iiixeo asen kra n tallit
Ssiked, deqqal ad walin
Gedha s Mass ik, Mass n tezmert, mgal ayen qqaoen
Tifrat $ef imazanen
Ccekoan i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
